snippet: Eddie Palmieri sustained a headlong momentum almost from start to finish in this exuberant three-hour concert, framed as a career retrospective.
abstract: Nate Chinen reviews Jazz at Lincoln Center tribute to Latin bandleader and pianist Eddie Palmieri.
lead_paragraph: Eddie Palmieri sustained a headlong momentum almost from start to finish in this exuberant three-hour concert, framed as a career retrospective.

headline.seo: Eddie Palmieri’s Retrospective at Jazz at Lincoln Center
headline.main: A Lifetime Spent Stoking the Flames
headline.print_headline: A Lifetime Spent Stoking the Flames
